title: Nobody Said It Would Be Easy
description: His father taught him to "go out there and face the bad stuff and get it under control." But control is the last thing Lance cares about when he learns that his drawing and riding hand may be paralyzed permanently. Lance becomes angry at the world. He's even mad at his best friend, Red. And the last thing he wants is a visit from his bratty cousin, Kat. Then disaster strikes, and the three teenagers must overcome their differences in order to survive. But can Lance and Kat stop fighting long enough to save their own lives and Red's?
author: Marilyn Halvorson
